verses.verse: <S%H1078>Bel<s%> boweth <S%H3766>down<s%>, <S%H5015>Nebo<s%> <S%H7164>stoopeth<s%>, their <S%H6091>idols<s%> were upon the <S%H2416>beasts<s%>, and upon the <S%H929>cattle<s%>: your <S%H5385>carriages<s%> were heavy <S%H6006>loaden<s%>; they are a <S%H4853>burden<s%> to the <S%H5889>weary<s%> beast.

They <S%H7164>stoop<s%>, they bow <S%H3766>down<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>; they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H4422>deliver<s%> the <S%H4853>burden<s%>, but <S%H5315>themselves<s%> are <S%H1980>gone<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%>. themselves: Heb. their soul

<S%H8085>Hearken<s%> unto me, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and all the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which are <S%H6006>borne<s%> by me from the <S%H990>belly<s%>, which are <S%H5375>carried<s%> from the <S%H7356>womb<s%>:

And even to your old <S%H2209>age<s%> I am he; and even to hoar <S%H7872>hairs<s%> will I <S%H5445>carry<s%> you: I have <S%H6213>made<s%>, and I will <S%H5375>bear<s%>; even I will <S%H5445>carry<s%>, and will <S%H4422>deliver<s%> you.
To whom will ye <S%H1819>liken<s%> me, and make me <S%H7737>equal<s%>, and <S%H4911>compare<s%> me, that we may be <S%H1819>like<s%>?

They <S%H2107>lavish<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> out of the <S%H3599>bag<s%>, and <S%H8254>weigh<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> in the <S%H7070>balance<s%>, and <S%H7936>hire<s%> a <S%H6884>goldsmith<s%>; and he <S%H6213>maketh<s%> it a <S%H410>god<s%>: they fall <S%H5456>down<s%>, yea, they <S%H7812>worship<s%>.

They <S%H5375>bear<s%> him upon the <S%H3802>shoulder<s%>, they <S%H5445>carry<s%> him, and set him in his <S%H3240>place<s%>, and he <S%H5975>standeth<s%>; from his <S%H4725>place<s%> shall he not <S%H4185>remove<s%>: yea, one shall <S%H6817>cry<s%> unto him, yet can he not <S%H6030>answer<s%>, nor <S%H3467>save<s%> him out of his <S%H6869>trouble<s%>.
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> this, and shew yourselves <S%H377>men<s%>: bring it <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3820>mind<s%>, O ye <S%H6586>transgressors<s%>.
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> the former <S%H7223>things<s%> of <S%H5769>old<s%>: for I am <S%H410>God<s%>, and there is none else; I am <S%H430>God<s%>, and there is <S%H657>none<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> me,

<S%H5046>Declaring<s%> the <S%H319>end<s%> from the <S%H7225>beginning<s%>, and from ancient <S%H6924>times<s%> the things that are not yet <S%H6213>done<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, My <S%H6098>counsel<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand<s%>, and I will <S%H6213>do<s%> all my <S%H2656>pleasure<s%>:

<S%H7121>Calling<s%> a ravenous <S%H5861>bird<s%> from the <S%H4217>east<s%>, the <S%H376>man<s%> that executeth my <S%H6098>counsel<s%> from a <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>: yea, I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, I will also <S%H935>bring<s%> it to pass; I have <S%H3335>purposed<s%> it, I will also <S%H6213>do<s%> it. that: Heb. of my counsel
<S%H8085>Hearken<s%> unto me, ye <S%H47>stouthearted<s%> <S%H3820><s%>, that are far <S%H7350>from<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>:

I bring <S%H7126>near<s%> my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>; it shall not be far <S%H7368>off<s%>, and my <S%H8668>salvation<s%> shall not <S%H309>tarry<s%>: and I will <S%H5414>place<s%> <S%H8668>salvation<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%> my <S%H8597>glory<s%>.
